components.name: ButtonComponent
CheckboxComponent
components.templateData:
<mat-checkbox
  class="p-checkbox"
  [ngClass]="{'select-all': selectAll}"
  [aria-label]="ariaLabel"
  [checked]="checked"
  [disabled]="disabled"
  [indeterminate]="indeterminate">
  <ng-container *ngIf="label">
    {{label}}
  </ng-container>
</mat-checkbox>

components.name: InputTextComponent
components.templateData:
<mat-form-field class="p-input-text"
                appearance="standard"
                [ngClass]="{'p-input-text-readonly' : readonly}"
                floatLabel="always">
  <mat-label class="p-input-text-label">{{label}}</mat-label>
  <input matInput
         [type]="type"
         [placeholder]="placeholder"
         [readonly]="readonly"
         attr.aria-label="{{ariaLabel}}"
         [formControl]="formFieldControl"
         onfocus="this.select()"
         class="p-input-text-input">
  <mat-error *ngIf="formFieldControl.invalid"
             class="p-input-text-error">
    {{errorMessage}}
  </mat-error>
</mat-form-field>

components.name: InputTextComponent
components.templateData:
<mat-form-field class="p-input-text"
                appearance="standard"
                [ngClass]="{'p-input-text-readonly' : readonly}"
                floatLabel="always">
  <mat-label class="p-input-text-label">{{label}}</mat-label>
  <input matInput
         [type]="type"
         [placeholder]="placeholder"
         [readonly]="readonly"
         attr.aria-label="{{ariaLabel}}"
         [formControl]="formFieldControl"
         onfocus="this.select()"
         class="p-input-text-input">
  <mat-error *ngIf="formFieldControl.invalid"
             class="p-input-text-error">
    {{errorMessage}}
  </mat-error>
</mat-form-field>

components.name: RadioButtonComponent
components.templateData:
<mat-radio-button class="p-radio-button"
                  [value]="value"
                  [disabled]="disabled"
                  [checked]="checked">
  {{label}}
</mat-radio-button>

components.name: RadioButtonGroup
components.templateData:
<mat-radio-group class="p-radio-group"
                 [formControl]="fieldFormControl"
                 [class.invalid-field]="fieldFormControl.invalid && (fieldFormControl.touched || formControlHost.submitted)">
  <label class="p-radio-group-label">{{label}}</label>
  <p-radio-button class="p-radio-group-option"
                  *ngFor="let option of optionsList"
                  [value]="option"
                  [label]="label"
                  [ariaLabel]="ariaLabel"
                  [checked]="checked"
                  [disabled]="disabled">
  </p-radio-button>
  <mat-error *ngIf="fieldFormControl.errors">
    {{errorMessage}}
  </mat-error>
</mat-radio-group>

components.name: SlideToggleComponent
components.templateData:
<mat-slide-toggle
  class="p-slide-toggle"
  [aria-label]="ariaLabel"
  [checked]="checked"
  [disabled]="disabled">
  <ng-container *ngIf="label">
    {{label}}
  </ng-container>
</mat-slide-toggle>

components.name: ToggleComponent
TooltipComponent
components.templateData:
<button #tooltip="matTooltip"
        [matTooltip]="message"
        [matTooltipDisabled]="disabled"
        [matTooltipShowDelay]="showDelay"
        [matTooltipHideDelay]="hideDelay"
        [matTooltipPosition]="position"
        [matTooltipClass]="tooltipClass"
        class="p-btn p-btn-small p-btn-primary"
        >
  Hover
</button>

components.name: TypographyFontFamilyComponent
components.templateData:
Typography / Font families

Source Sans Pro

Used only in caps, bold and 5% letter spacing, on headlines and highlighted areas such as menus, tabs, page titles, etc.

Bold

ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ1234567890/?.,<>;:!@#$%^&*()~`

$font-family-accent
.font-family-accent
.weight-bold

Inter

Used in all the text of the paragraphs and wherever there is text in the lower case such as subheadings, buttons, etc.

Regular

ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ1234567890/?.,<>;:!@#$%^&*()~`

$font-family-basic
.font-family-basic
.weight-regular

Medium

ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ1234567890/?.,<>;:!@#$%^&*()~`

$font-family-basic
.font-family-basic
.weight-medium

Semi Bold

ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ1234567890/?.,<>;:!@#$%^&*()~`

$font-family-basic
.font-family-basic
.weight-semi-bold

Bold

ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ1234567890/?.,<>;:!@#$%^&*()~`

$font-family-basic
.font-family-basic
.weight-bold
